channel.title: New Character Question
channel.description:
I am using this servers to learn a little more about how Java Functions, but I was wondering if it is possible to make it where it does not make a new char, if the char does not exist. If so, how?
Thanks Guys

item.title: New Character Question
item.dc:creator: @Lamez Lamez
item.description:
@Lamez wrote:

well I did not think of that, and I did find a bit of helpful code:

} else if (LoadGame == 3) { //you must make new user
					returnCode = 2;
					disconnected = true;
					savefile = false;
					boolean Found = true;
					for (int i = 0; i < server.MaxConnections; i++) {
						if (server.Connections[i] == connectedFrom) {
							server.ConnectionCount[i]++;
							Found = true;
							break;
						}
					}
					if (Found == false) {
						for (int i = 0; i < server.MaxConnections; i++) {
							if (server.Connections[i] == null) {
								server.Connections[i] = connectedFrom;
								server.ConnectionCount[i] = 1;
								break;
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

See how I set some values to false, and some to true.

Well it does not let a new character in, but it keeps showing the message Disconnected, and it keeps them in that loop. I was wondering how I could completely drop the client?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 14, 2008, 10:23:20 pm[/size][hr]anyone, could it be like clientDrop() or somthing…

Read full topic

@pkforlol3 wrote:

go search in your client.java for “save”
then u can find alot of stuff, read them and maybe delete something about “saving character files”.
or else… idk…

item.description:
@Lamez wrote:

Right, I do not want the server to automatically make a character.

If the character does not exist, when they are logging, then I do not want the server to make a character file.
